title: SPORTS COACHING & TRAINING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) O'Level credit passes at one (1) sitting, to include English Language, Mathematics, one (1) Science subject (Biology/Health Science/Health Education/Physical Education) and any two (2) other subjects  OR 


Six (6) O'Level credit passes at two (2) sittings. to include English Language, Mathematics, one (1) Science subject (Biology/Health Science/Health Education/Physical Education and any three (3) other subjects.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.
